code: import axios from'axios';import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[url,setUrl]=useState("");const[sent,setSent]=useState(false);const[name,setName]=useState("");const sendUrl=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setSent(true);try{await axios.post("http://localhost:4000/get_text",{url,name});}catch(error){console.log(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:!sent?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Enter Name for File and URL"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:sendUrl,className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"text-input",placeholder:"Name your audio here",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"text-input",placeholder:"Paste in your url here",value:url,onChange:e=>setUrl(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Create Audio"})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Audio Created"})});}export default App;
